title: Verify the membership program displayed in the search results when user search using digits and special characters.

2. Navigate to Membership Program Admin Search Page
3. Search using digits
4. Search using special characters
5. Search using star(*)
6. Click on search icon without entering any data
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. User should be logged into PV application successfully
2. User should able to navigated successfully
3. Results related to digits should be displayed successfully
4. Results related to special characters should be displayed successfully
5. All Results should be displayed successfully
6. All Results should be displayed successfully

title: Verify the membership Level is awarded to the Registered Patron2 while doing package claim reservation using 2 registered patron.
custom_preconds:
Create Membership Program
Create Package
Associate the membership program to the package
Select the membership Award Level as Level by Price
Set same membership level to different price scales
Create financial patron and 2 registered patron

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login to PV
2. Navigate to Ticket Sales
Select the package and financial patron
Select 2 seats and select one price scale
click on lock seats

3. Click on the Assign Friends link and assign one seat to registered patron1
4. Click on Reserve link and reserve the tickets
5. Click on Add Offer
Navigate to Ticket Sales
Select another 2 seats and select one price scale
Click on lock seats

6. Click on the Assign Friends link and assign one seat to registered patron2
Click on Reserve link and reserve the tickets
7. Click on Checkout
8. Click on the Order Id and navigate to Ticket Services
Select the action as Claim Reservtaion
Select all the tickets and click on Apply Action
Select the delivery method and payment method
Click on checkout
9. Verify the membership level is awarded to the financial patron and 2 registered patrons
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. User should be logged into PV application successfully
2. User should able to navigated to the cart successfully
3. user should able to assign ticket to registered patron1 successfully
4. User should able to reserve the tickets successfully
5. User should able to navigated to the cart successfully
6. user should able to assign ticket to registered patron1 and reserve the tickets successfully
7. Transaction completed successfully
8. Transaction completed successfully
9. The membership should be awarded to the  financial patron and 2 registered patron

title: Verify Event Admin Bulk Create Loyalty program selection does not wipe the user inputs

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login to PVNG and login using valid credentials
2. Navigate to Event Admin, select an existing Event that has no loyalty program associated to it
3. Click on Bulk Create

4. Enter start/end date, time, day of week and a few other selections
5. Choose the Loyalty Program and attach
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login successful
2. Event detail page loaded
3. Bulk create details page loaded
4. User inputs should be done successfully
5. All data entered by the user should be retained and loyalty program should be attached successfully

title: Verify Event Admin Bulk Create Loyalty program selection does not wipe the user inputs while changing existing loyaly program

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login to PVNG and login using valid credentials
2. Navigate to Event Admin, select an existing Event that has a loyalty program associated to it
3. Click on Bulk Create

4. Enter start/end date, time, day of week and a few other selections
5. Delete the present loyalty program
6. Select a different loyalty program and attach to it
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login successful
2. Event detail page loaded
3. Bulk create details page loaded
4. User inputs should be done successfully
5. All data entered by the user should be retained and loyalty program should be deleted successfully
6. All data entered by the user should be retained and loyalty program should be attached successfully

title: Verify proper error messages are returned when providing alpha numeric charters in Relative â€œActivation Dateâ€�/ Relative â€œExpiration Dateâ€� fields in Package Admin Membership tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login to PVNG and login using valid credentials
2. Navigate to package admin -->membership tab
3. Set Relative Activation Date: alpha numeric charters and Relative Expiration date: alpha numeric charters and click APPLY CHANGES

4. Set Relative Activation Date: alpha numeric charters and Relative Expiration date: -ve number and click APPLY CHANGES
5. Set Relative Activation Date: -ve number and Relative Expiration date: alpha numeric charters and click APPLY CHANGES
6. Set Relative Activation Date: -ve number and Relative Expiration date: NULL and click APPLY CHANGES
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login successful
2. Membership detail page loaded
3. Activation date is not a valid whole number, Expiration date is not a valid whole number message should be displayed
4. Activation date is not a valid whole number, Relative time amount cannot be negative for Expiration date message should be displayed
5. Expiration date is not a valid whole number, Relative time amount cannot be negative for Activation date message should be displayed
6. Relative time amount is required for Activation date, Relative time amount is required for Expiration date message should be displayed

title: Verify proper error messages are returned when providing alpha numeric charters in Fixed â€œActivation Dateâ€�/ Fixed â€œExpiration Dateâ€� fields in Package Admin Membership tab

3. Set Fixed Activation Date: alpha numeric charters and Fixed Expiration date: alpha numeric charters and click APPLY CHANGES

5. Set Fixed Activation Date: -ve number and Fixed Expiration date: alpha numeric charters and click APPLY CHANGES
6. Set Fixed Activation Date: -ve number and Fixed Expiration date: NULL and click APPLY CHANGES
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login successful
2. Membership detail page loaded
3. Fixed start date is not a valid date,Fixed end date is not a valid date message should be displayed
4. Fixed start date is not a valid date,Fixed end date is not a valid date message should be displayed
5. Fixed start date is not a valid date,Fixed end date is not a valid date message should be displayed
6. Fixed start date is not a valid date,Fixed end date is not a valid date message should be displayed

title: Verify that user is able to add a new loyalty program and qualifying groups after removing an existing loyalty program
custom_preconds:
Should have a membership program with loyalty associated.
The membership level should have qualifying groups of associated loyalty.

custom_steps_separated.content:

2. Choose the membership program mentioned in pre-requisite and click on Edit against the membership level
3. Verify the qualifying groups displayed in membership level.
4. Remove the loyalty from membership program
5. Add another loyalty program to the membership program
6. Add qualifying groups of that loyalty
7. Click on Apply changes
custom_steps_separated.expected:

2. Membership level should be expanded.
3. qualifying groups should be displayed in membership level.
4. qualifying groups should be removed
5. Should be able to add new loyalty program
6. Should be able to add qualifying groups of that loyalty.
7. New loyalty program and qualifying groups should be added successfully.

title: Verify concurrency error on patron account loyalty detail record is not happening when attempting to checkout
custom_preconds:
1.Login PV
2.Create a new loyalty program
3.Add a qualifying group
4.Navigate to membership administration
5.Create a membership program
6.Add the loyalty program to membership
7.Add membership levels ( 2 levels one LOW and one HIGH, say silver and gold respectively)
8.Associate qualifying group of the loyalty program to the highest membership level
9.Set the required points for earning that level under qualifying group as 10
10.Create a new patron
11.Grant the above membership program lowest level to the patron
12.Associate the loyalty program to an event
13.Associate the event to an event list and the event list to a package

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login PV
2. Navigate to ticket sales
3. select the package and patron mentioned in pre requisite
4. select the number of tickets such that the loyalty points earned grants the patron the highest membership level(points>10)
5. Complete the transaction
6. within 60 seconds or less, return the package
note: 60 seconds is the default interval in which the earned-membership-level process run. may take several attempts
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login successful
2. Navigation successful
3. User able to select the package and patron successfully
4. User navigated to shopping cart page
5. Transaction should be completed successfully. Patron should earn loyalty points and upgrade the membership level from lowest to highest (i.e from silver to gold here)
6. There should not be any concurrency error and package should be returned successfully

title: Verify concurrency error on patron account loyalty detail record is not happening when attempting to checkout
custom_preconds:
1.Login PV
2.Create a new loyalty program
3.Add a qualifying group
4.Navigate to membership administration
5.Create a membership program
6.Add the loyalty program to membership
7.Add membership levels ( 2 levels one LOW and one HIGH, say silver and gold respectively)
8.Associate qualifying group of the loyalty program to the highest membership level
9.Set the required points for earning that level under qualifying group as 10
10.Create a new patron
11.Grant the above membership program lowest level to the patron
12.Associate the loyalty program to an event

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login PV
2. set the earned membership evaluation process to run every 60 i.e set the app property: process.loyalty.points.thread.interval.seconds value to 60 under application properties
3. Navigate to ticket sales
4. select the event and patron mentioned in pre requisite
5. select the number of tickets such that the loyalty points earned grants the patron the highest membership level(points>10)
6. Complete the transaction
7. make note of the timestamp on when the awarded loyalty point record was processed (ACCOUNT_LOYALTY_PROGRAM_DETAIL.POINT_PROCESSED_DATE should not be null in DB). let's assume the thread kicks in at the 01 second mark (e.g., 7:00:01, 7:01:01, 7:02:01, etc.)
8. lock seats for the above event and prepare the cart to checkout but don't checkout until you pass the :01 sec mark (e.g., a second or so after 7:05:01). After the mark checkout
9. quickly go to ticket services and lock the tickets for a return (must lock before the earned-membership-level process kicks in again; eg. 7:06:01)
10. now go to the database and check if the patron's loyalty points have been processed (POINT_PROCESSED = 1, POINT_PROCESSED_DATE= not null)
select * from pvqaf02.account_loyalty_program_detail where patron_account_id=42877163 ; 
11. once processed, complete the return
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login successful
2. 
3. Navigation successful
4. User able to select the package and patron successfully
5. User navigated to shopping cart page
6. Transaction should be completed successfully. Patron should earn loyalty points and upgrade the membership level from lowest to highest (i.e from silver to gold here)
7. Timestamp noted using the update from DB
8. Checkout successful
9. Tickets locked for return and shopping cart page loaded
10. Values of (POINT_PROCESSED = 1, POINT_PROCESSED_DATE= not null) should be correct in DB.Once these values are updated the process is completed
11. Transaction should be completed successfully without any concurrency error.

title: Verify correct event name is displayed for the buyertype quota validation error when multiple events are added to an eventlist
custom_preconds:
1.Login PV BOTS
2.Navigate to supplier administration-->configuration-->buyertypes
3.set quota 5 for buyertype child
4.Have a fixed package with multiple event list and each event list has multiple events added to it.
5.Enforce buyertype quota for all the events from any single event list

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login PV BOTS
2. Navigate to tickets sales.select the package in pre-requisite.
3. Lock more than 5 seats for the CHILD buyertype from the same eventlist such that it exceeds the quota limit
4. Click on Assign friends link and click on Validate
5. Verify the error message displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login successful
2. Selection successful
3. Shopping cart page loaded
4. Error message is displayed
5. The VALIDATE button within the ASSIGN FRIENDS panel/tab should validate only the seats within the offer. The event name displayed in error message should be the event currently in the assign friends panel.

title: Verify incorrect time entered is changing to the default time and date gets unchanged when apply changes is clicked under membership event reference date

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login PV BOTS
2. Navigate to membership program-->existing program
3. Make sure that the Reference Date/Time is not today's date
4. Change the time part to inaccurate such as 12:00 BC
5. Do not click anywhere else in the page and click on Apply Changes.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login successful
2. Existing program detail page loaded
3. Reference date is not present day
4. Changed successfully
5. The application should change the time to default time 12:00 AM and should not change the reference date to the current date.

4. Change the time part to inaccurate such as 12:00 BC
5. Do not click anywhere else in the page and click on Apply Changes.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login successful
2. Existing program general options page loaded
3. fixed date and time is not present day
4. Changed successfully
5. The application should change the time to default time 12:00 AM and should not change the reference date to the current date.

title: Verify Loyalty Points earned by patron is maintained in Membership Level
custom_preconds: Navigate to Loyalty Administration and Create a Loyalty Program with active Status

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Click on Qualifying Groups tab
2. Click on New and create Qualifying Group
3. Create few Events and Packages and associate the Qualifying Group
4. Create a Membership Level and associate the Qualifying group with Level Activation Date as NULL and Expiration date 1 day relative
5. Create a patron with an active, unexpired membership and donâ€™t have any activity which would grant a better level
6. Purchase tickets from Events and Packages before Level Activation date, such that the Loyalty Points earned by patron reaches or exceeds required # of points defined in Membership Level

1. User should be navigate to Qualifying Groups tab
2. User should able to create
3. user should able to create
4. user should able to create Membership 
5. user should able to create patron
6. Patron will EARN the membership level but will not be active and existing membership level will be maintained

title: Verify patron will EARN the membership level and it will be activated immediatly when Membership Level associate the Qualifying group with a non-null Level Activation Date and Expiration date 1 day relative

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Create a Loyalty Program
2. Create a Qualifying Group
3. Create few Events and Packages and associate the Qualifying Group
4.  Create a Membership Level and associate the Qualifying group with a non-null Level Activation Date and Expiration date 1 day relative
5. Create a patron with an active, unexpired membership and donâ€™t have any activity which would grant a better level
6. Purchase tickets from Events and Packages on or after Level Activation date, such that the Loyalty Points earned by patron reaches or exceeds required # of points defined in Membership Level
7. Verify the patron shall earn the Membership level
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Loylaty program should be created successfully
2. Qualifying Group should be created successfully
3. Events and packages should be associated with the Qualifying Group
4. Membership level should be created and associated the Qualifying group with a non-null level activation date and expiration date 1 day relative successfully
5. Patron should be created with mentioned options
6. Tickets should be purchased for Events and Packages successfully
7. Patron will EARN the membership level and will be activated immediately

title: Verify that Existing membership level will be retained

title: Verify that incrementally earned points ultimately result in the earned level when Purchase tickets from Events and Packages such that the Loyalty Points earned by patron reaches or exceeds required # of points defined in Membership Level in multiple

custom_steps_separated.content:

2. Create a Qualifying Group
3. reate few Events and Packages and associate the Qualifying Group
4. Create a Membership Level and associate the Qualifying group
5.  Create a patron with an active, unexpired membership and have a membership level with higher rank than the one created in step 4
6. Create a patron without a membership

3. Events and packages should be associated with the Qualifying Group
4. Membership level should be created and associated with Qualifying group
5. Patron should be created with mentioned options
6. Patron should be created without Membership
7. Success
